name: Esha!
greetingText: I really like your name cuz it sounds cooler than Shivani
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do (a DM)
text3: But then I stopped and realised
wishText: Cheers to another year of pretending to be an adult!
replayText: Now tell me if you liked it :P
